# BlackRoad OS - Partner & Channel Program

**Complete partner onboarding, enablement, and revenue sharing**
**Generated by:** Copernicus (copywriting specialist)
**Date:** January 4, 2026

---

## Partner Program Philosophy

**"We grow when our partners grow."**

BlackRoad OS is designed for **partner-led growth**. The platform's complexity (agent orchestration, compliance, cryptography) creates natural demand for implementation partners, system integrators, and consultants.

**Our commitment:**
- **Fair revenue sharing** (20-30% margins for partners)
- **Co-marketing support** (joint case studies, webinars, events)
- **Technical enablement** (certification, training, engineering support)
- **Deal registration protection** (first partner to register gets the commission)

---

## Partner Types & Tiers

### Partner Categories

**1. Reseller Partners**
*Sell BlackRoad OS licenses directly to end customers*

- **Who:** VARs, MSPs, cloud resellers
- **Value:** Adds BlackRoad OS to existing product portfolio
- **Commission:** 20% recurring revenue share
- **Support level:** Tier 1 support (partners handle), Tier 2+ escalated to BlackRoad OS

---

**2. Implementation Partners (SI/Consulting)**
*Deploy and customize BlackRoad OS for enterprise customers*

- **Who:** System integrators, consulting firms, boutique agencies
- **Value:** Professional services revenue (deployment, training, custom integration)
- **Commission:** 30% of professional services fees + 10% recurring revenue share
- **Support level:** Direct access to BlackRoad OS engineering team

---

**3. Technology Partners (ISV/OEM)**
*Integrate BlackRoad OS into their products*

- **Who:** SaaS platforms, enterprise software vendors
- **Value:** Embed agent orchestration into their product (white-label or co-branded)
- **Commission:** Custom rev-share (typically 15-25% based on volume)
- **Support level:** Joint engineering support, co-development agreements

---

**4. Referral Partners**
*Generate leads without selling directly*

- **Who:** Industry consultants, advisors, influencers
- **Value:** Easy passive income for qualified referrals
- **Commission:** 10% of first-year ACV (one-time payment)
- **Support level:** Marketing materials only, no technical support required

---

## Revenue Sharing Models

### Model 1: Reseller (Transactional)

**How it works:**
1. Partner sells BlackRoad OS license to end customer
2. Partner invoices customer (collects payment)
3. Partner remits 80% to BlackRoad OS monthly
4. Partner keeps 20% as margin

**Example:**
- Customer pays partner: $5,000/month (Enterprise tier)
- Partner remits to BlackRoad OS: $4,000/month
- Partner keeps: $1,000/month (20% margin)

**Payment terms:** Net 30 from partner to BlackRoad OS

---

### Model 2: Agency/Referral

**How it works:**
1. Partner refers customer to BlackRoad OS
2. BlackRoad OS sells directly (handles contract, billing)
3. BlackRoad OS pays partner commission monthly

**Example:**
- Customer pays BlackRoad OS: $5,000/month
- BlackRoad OS pays partner: $500/month (10% referral fee)

**Payment terms:** Net 30 from BlackRoad OS to partner

---

### Model 3: Implementation Services

**How it works:**
1. Customer buys BlackRoad OS license from BlackRoad OS
2. Customer hires partner for implementation services
3. Partner bills customer directly for services
4. BlackRoad OS pays partner 10% recurring revenue share (on top of services revenue)

**Example:**
- Customer pays BlackRoad OS: $60K/year (Enterprise license)
- Customer pays partner: $50K (one-time implementation fee)
- BlackRoad OS pays partner: $500/month ongoing (10% of $5K/month license)

**Total partner revenue:**
- Year 1: $50K (services) + $6K (recurring) = $56K
- Year 2+: $6K/year recurring

---

### Model 4: OEM/White-Label

**How it works:**
1. Technology partner embeds BlackRoad OS into their product
2. Partner bills end customer (BlackRoad OS is invisible to customer)
3. Partner pays BlackRoad OS per-seat or per-usage fee

**Example:**
- Partner charges customer: $10K/month (their product + BlackRoad OS embedded)
- Partner pays BlackRoad OS: $2K/month (20% of their revenue attributable to agent orchestration)

**Payment terms:** Custom contract (typically quarterly minimum commitments)

---

## Partner Onboarding Process

### Phase 1: Application (Week 1)

**Step 1: Apply**
- Complete partner application form: [Link to form]
- Provide: Company info, target market, deal pipeline, technical capabilities

**Step 2: Review**
- BlackRoad OS partnership team reviews (2 business days)
- Criteria: Market fit, technical capability, sales track record

**Step 3: Approval**
- If approved â†’ Welcome email with next steps
- If declined â†’ Feedback on gaps, option to reapply in 6 months

---

### Phase 2: Contracting (Week 2)

**Step 1: Partner Agreement**
- Sign standard partner agreement (or negotiate custom terms for strategic partners)
- Key terms: Revenue share %, deal registration rules, SLA commitments

**Step 2: Portal Access**
- Get credentials to BlackRoad OS Partner Portal
- Access: Training materials, sales collateral, demo environments, deal registration system

**Step 3: Kickoff Call**
- 60-minute kickoff with partner manager
- Agenda: Program overview, success metrics, resource introduction, Q&A

---

### Phase 3: Enablement (Week 3-4)

**Step 1: Sales Training**
- 4-hour virtual workshop covering:
  - BlackRoad OS product overview
  - Target customer profiles (ICP)
  - Competitive positioning
  - Pricing & packaging
  - Objection handling
  - Demo best practices

**Step 2: Technical Training**
- 8-hour hands-on lab covering:
  - Platform architecture
  - Deployment (cloud, on-premise, hybrid)
  - Integration patterns (APIs, connectors)
  - Compliance configuration (HIPAA, SOC 2, FedRAMP)
  - Troubleshooting & support escalation

**Step 3: Certification**
- Sales certification: Multiple-choice exam (80% pass rate required)
- Technical certification: Hands-on lab + architecture design exercise
- Badge issued upon passing (display on website, LinkedIn)

---

### Phase 4: Go-Live (Week 5+)

**Step 1: First Deal**
- Register first opportunity in partner portal
- Joint discovery call (partner + BlackRoad OS SE)
- Partner leads, BlackRoad OS supports

**Step 2: Co-Selling**
- BlackRoad OS provides: Demo environment, POC support, contract templates
- Partner provides: Customer relationship, implementation, ongoing support

**Step 3: Customer Success**
- Partner delivers implementation
- BlackRoad OS monitors platform health, provides product updates
- Joint quarterly business review (QBR) with customer

---

## Certification & Training

### Sales Certification

**Duration:** 4 hours (self-paced online + 1-hour live Q&A)

**Curriculum:**
1. **Product Overview (45 min)**
   - What is BlackRoad OS?
   - Key differentiators (deterministic AI, compliance, 30K agent orchestration)
   - Customer ROI examples

2. **Target Markets (30 min)**
   - Healthcare (HIPAA compliance)
   - Financial services (SEC/FINRA regulatory)
   - Government (FedRAMP)
   - SaaS (SOC 2 compliance)

3. **Competitive Positioning (45 min)**
   - vs OpenAI API (orchestration vs LLM)
   - vs LangChain (managed platform vs DIY framework)
   - vs Build-In-House (ROI, time-to-market)

4. **Pricing & Packaging (30 min)**
   - Developer (free), Professional ($499/mo), Enterprise (custom)
   - Add-ons (HIPAA, SOC 2, FedRAMP packs)
   - Discounting guidelines (when to escalate)

5. **Sales Process (60 min)**
   - Discovery questions (Socratic method)
   - Demo best practices (outcome-focused, not feature dump)
   - Objection handling (price, build-in-house, timing)
   - Closing techniques (assumptive close, POC â†’ contract)

6. **Exam (30 min)**
   - 40 multiple-choice questions
   - 80% pass rate required
   - Retake allowed after 7 days if failed

**Certification Badge:** "BlackRoad OS Certified Sales Partner"

---

### Technical Certification

**Duration:** 8 hours (2-day hands-on workshop)

**Curriculum:**

**Day 1: Architecture & Deployment**
1. **Platform Architecture (2 hours)**
   - Core components (Prism Console, RoadChain, ALICE QI, Lucidia)
   - PS-SHA-âˆž identity chains
   - SIG (Spiral Information Geometry) routing

2. **Deployment Patterns (3 hours)**
   - Cloud deployment (Railway, AWS, GCP, Azure)
   - On-premise deployment (Kubernetes, Docker)
   - Hybrid deployment (edge devices + cloud orchestration)
   - Hands-on lab: Deploy BlackRoad OS to test environment

**Day 2: Integration & Troubleshooting**
3. **Integration Patterns (2 hours)**
   - REST API integration
   - Webhook subscriptions (event streaming)
   - Custom connectors (databases, SaaS platforms)
   - Hands-on lab: Build custom integration to Salesforce

4. **Troubleshooting & Support (1 hour)**
   - Common issues (agent coordination failures, compliance audit errors)
   - Diagnostic tools (logs, metrics, traces)
   - Escalation process (Tier 1 â†’ Tier 2 â†’ Engineering)

5. **Final Exam (30 min + 30 min)**
   - Architecture design exercise: "Design BlackRoad OS deployment for 10K-agent healthcare system with HIPAA requirements"
   - Judged by BlackRoad OS engineering team
   - Pass/fail (detailed feedback provided)

**Certification Badge:** "BlackRoad OS Certified Technical Partner"

---

## Deal Registration & Protection

### Deal Registration System

**Why register deals:**
- **Commission protection:** First partner to register gets the commission
- **No double-dipping:** Prevents multiple partners claiming same deal
- **Forecasting:** Helps BlackRoad OS plan capacity and support resources

---

### Registration Rules

**1. Early Registration (Discovery Stage)**
- Partner registers deal after first discovery call with customer
- Required info: Company name, contact name, email, deal size estimate, close date estimate
- **Protection period:** 90 days from registration

**2. Claim Verification**
- BlackRoad OS validates registration within 2 business days
- Checks: Is customer already in BlackRoad OS CRM? Did another partner register first?
- If valid â†’ Approved (partner notified)
- If conflict â†’ Arbitration (both partners provide evidence, BlackRoad OS decides)

**3. Deal Progression**
- Partner updates deal stage in portal: Discovery â†’ Demo â†’ POC â†’ Negotiation â†’ Closed-Won
- If no activity for 60 days â†’ Deal marked "stale," other partners can claim

**4. Commission Payment**
- Upon customer signature, partner submits signed contract to BlackRoad OS
- BlackRoad OS validates, invoices customer (or partner invoices customer if reseller model)
- Commission paid Net 30 from first payment receipt

---

### Commission Disputes (Rare)

**Scenario:** Two partners claim same deal

**Resolution:**
1. Both partners submit evidence (emails, meeting notes, customer confirmation)
2. BlackRoad OS partnership team reviews within 5 business days
3. Decision criteria:
   - Who had first meaningful customer engagement?
   - Who registered first?
   - Who drove most value (demo, POC, proposal)?
4. Decision is final (no appeals)

**Split commission option:** If both partners contributed materially, BlackRoad OS may offer 50/50 split (requires both partners to agree)

---

## Co-Marketing Programs

### Joint Case Studies

**How it works:**
1. Partner and BlackRoad OS identify successful customer deployment
2. Interview customer (partner + BlackRoad OS marketing team)
3. Write case study highlighting:
   - Customer challenge
   - Solution (BlackRoad OS + partner services)
   - Results (ROI, metrics, quotes)
4. Co-branded PDF + blog post + social media promotion

**Distribution:**
- Published on both BlackRoad OS and partner websites
- Shared on LinkedIn, Twitter (both companies tag each other)
- Included in email nurture campaigns

**Benefit:** Shared lead generation (both companies get inbound from case study)

---

### Joint Webinars

**Frequency:** Quarterly (one webinar per partner per quarter)

**Format:**
- 45-minute webinar
- Co-hosted: BlackRoad OS product expert + partner industry expert
- Topic: Industry-specific use case (e.g., "AI Orchestration for HIPAA Compliance in Healthcare")
- Live Q&A

**Promotion:**
- Both companies promote via email lists, social media
- Registration landing page co-branded
- Leads shared 50/50 (both companies get full lead list)

**Example topics:**
- "Automating Compliance for Financial Services with BlackRoad OS" (partner: fintech consulting firm)
- "Scaling AI Agents in Government: A FedRAMP Journey" (partner: gov tech integrator)

---

### Conference Sponsorships

**For Gold+ partners:**
- BlackRoad OS co-sponsors partner booth at industry conferences
- Booth branding: Both logos displayed
- Cost split: BlackRoad OS covers 50% of booth cost (up to $10K per event)
- Lead sharing: Both companies get full lead list from booth

**Target conferences:**
- Healthcare: HIMSS, HLTH
- Finance: Money20/20, Finovate
- AI/Tech: NeurIPS, AWS re:Invent, Google Cloud Next

---

### Content Collaboration

**Partner-created content:**
- Blog posts (published on partner blog, cross-posted to BlackRoad OS blog)
- Whitepapers (co-branded, gated lead gen asset)
- YouTube demos/tutorials (partner demonstrates BlackRoad OS deployment)

**BlackRoad OS support:**
- Technical review (ensure accuracy)
- SEO optimization
- Social media amplification (BlackRoad OS shares partner content)

**Example:** Partner writes "How We Deployed BlackRoad OS for a 20K-Agent Healthcare System in 2 Weeks" â†’ generates leads for both companies

---

## MDF (Market Development Funds)

### What is MDF?

**MDF = Money partners can use for marketing activities to drive BlackRoad OS revenue**

**Eligible activities:**
- Webinars, events, conferences
- Content creation (case studies, whitepapers, videos)
- Paid ads (Google, LinkedIn) promoting BlackRoad OS + partner
- Email campaigns to partner's database

---

### MDF Allocation by Tier

```
TIER            MDF/QUARTER      CONDITIONS
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
Bronze          $0               Not eligible (too early stage)
Silver          $5,000           â€¢ Must be matched 1:1 by partner
                                 â€¢ Pre-approval required
Gold            $15,000          â€¢ 50% match required from partner
                                 â€¢ Pre-approval required
Platinum        $50,000          â€¢ No match required
                                 â€¢ Quarterly planning session
```

---

### MDF Application Process

**Step 1: Proposal**
- Partner submits MDF request via partner portal
- Required: Activity description, budget breakdown, expected ROI (leads/pipeline)

**Step 2: Approval**
- BlackRoad OS reviews within 5 business days
- Criteria: Alignment with BlackRoad OS go-to-market, realistic ROI, compliant with brand guidelines

**Step 3: Execution**
- Partner executes activity (webinar, event, etc.)
- Must use BlackRoad OS-approved branding/messaging

**Step 4: Reimbursement**
- Partner submits receipts/invoices + campaign results (leads, pipeline, closed deals)
- BlackRoad OS reimburses within 30 days via ACH/wire

---

## Partner Portal & Resources

### Portal Features

**URL:** partners.blackroad.systems (login required)

**Sections:**

**1. Training & Certification**
- Access sales and technical training courses
- Schedule live workshops
- Download certification badges

**2. Deal Registration**
- Register new opportunities
- Track deal status (Discovery â†’ Closed-Won)
- View commission forecasts

**3. Marketing Assets**
- Download: Logos, slide decks, one-pagers, case studies, battle cards
- Co-branded templates (customizable with partner logo)
- Email templates for outreach

**4. Technical Resources**
- API documentation
- Deployment guides (step-by-step for cloud/on-premise)
- Integration templates (Salesforce, Workday, Epic, etc.)
- Demo environments (sandbox accounts for partner use)

**5. Support & Escalation**
- Submit support tickets
- Escalate to BlackRoad OS engineering (for Tier 2+ issues)
- Knowledge base (FAQs, troubleshooting guides)

**6. MDF Management**
- Submit MDF requests
- Track approval status
- Upload reimbursement receipts

---

### Quarterly Business Reviews (QBRs)

**For Silver+ partners:**
- Scheduled quarterly
- Attendees: Partner leadership + BlackRoad OS partner manager
- Agenda:
  1. Performance review (deals closed, ARR, certifications)
  2. Customer success stories
  3. Challenges & roadblocks
  4. Co-marketing plans (upcoming webinars, events)
  5. Roadmap preview (what's coming in next release)
  6. MDF planning

**Outcome:** Aligned on goals for next quarter, action items documented

---

## Partner Agreement Templates

### Standard Reseller Agreement (Summary)

**Key Terms:**

**1. Revenue Share**
- Partner receives 20% of recurring revenue (Bronze/Silver)
- Scales to 30% (Gold) or 35% (Platinum)

**2. Territory**
- Non-exclusive (multiple partners can operate in same geography/industry)
- Exception: Strategic Platinum partners may negotiate exclusive verticals

**3. Support Obligations**
- Partner handles Tier 1 support (first line customer questions)
- BlackRoad OS handles Tier 2+ (technical escalations, bugs)

**4. Deal Registration**
- 90-day protection period from registration
- First partner to register gets commission (barring conflicts)

**5. Term & Termination**
- Initial term: 12 months
- Auto-renews unless either party gives 60 days notice
- Immediate termination for: fraud, brand violation, non-payment

**6. Marketing & Branding**
- Partner may use BlackRoad OS logos/trademarks with approval
- Must follow brand guidelines (available in partner portal)
- No disparagement of BlackRoad OS or competitors

**Full agreement:** Available in partner portal upon application approval

---

## Partner Program FAQ

**Q: Can I become a partner if I'm also a customer?**
A: Yes! Many customers become partners (especially consulting firms who implement for their own use, then offer services to others).

**Q: Do I need to be certified before I can sell?**
A: No, but certification is strongly encouraged. Certified partners close deals 2Ã— faster on average.

**Q: Can I discount BlackRoad OS pricing?**
A: Discounting authority:
- Bronze/Silver: No discounting (escalate to BlackRoad OS)
- Gold: Up to 10% discount without approval
- Platinum: Up to 20% discount without approval

**Q: What if my customer wants to buy directly from BlackRoad OS instead of through me?**
A: If you registered the deal, you still get commission even if BlackRoad OS handles the contract/billing (Agency model).

**Q: How quickly do I get paid?**
A: Net 30 from when BlackRoad OS receives customer payment (or from when partner remits payment in reseller model).

**Q: Can I white-label BlackRoad OS?**
A: Yes, for Platinum tier only. Requires custom OEM agreement.

**Q: What support do I get for technical pre-sales?**
A: Silver+ partners get access to BlackRoad OS Solutions Engineers for joint customer calls, POCs, and technical Q&A.
